Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_update_3D_position

The function AIL_update_3D_position updates a 3D sample, listener, or 3D object's position based on its previously set velocity and the specified delta time in milliseconds.

void AIL_update_3D_position(
  H3DPOBJECT obj,
  F32 dt_milliseconds
);

In Parameters

obj
indicates the 3D sample, the listener, or the 3D object to query.
dt_milliseconds
indicates the amount of time that has passed in milliseconds.

Discussion

This function simply takes the current position and moves it based on the velocity vector and specified millisecond count.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_auto_update_3D_position, AIL_set_3D_position, AIL_set_3D_velocity, AIL_set_3D_velocity_vector
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DPOBJECT, void
